videos.description: UNC Justin Jackson made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Nate Britt.
videos.headline: Justin Jackson heats up from behind the arc

videos.description: UNC Isaiah Hicks made Dunk. Assisted by Joel Berry II.
videos.headline: Hicks slams it home off the alley-oop

videos.description: UNC Justin Jackson made Dunk. Assisted by Joel Berry II
videos.headline: Justin Jackson finishes off the alley-oop

videos.description: TULN Cameron Reynolds made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Melvin Frazier.
videos.headline: Tulane staying close with three point shot

videos.description: UNC Joel Berry II made Three Point Jumper. Assisted by Nate Britt.
videos.headline: Joel Berry splashes long three to exend lead

videos.description: Isaiah Hicks gets the ball at the end of a mad scramble to rock the rim with a two-hand dunk getting the Tar Heels off and running in the second half.
videos.headline: Hicks' huge dunk has UNC rolling in second half
Melvin Frazier goes up and under for an athletic finish

videos.description: With Tulane needing a spark, Kain Harris goes hard to the rim and throws down a huge two-handed dunk.
videos.headline: Harris puts a UNC defender on a poster
